Package lexa.core.server

Interface Summary
Queue A queue for use by the message broker and its services.
ThreadedQueueCallBackInterface Created with IntelliJ IDEA.
 

Class Summary
Context Contains constants used in the config for the Lexa MessageBroker.
FIFOQueue A simple FIFO queue for use by the message broker and its services.
Message Message builder class.
MessageBroker A message broker to provide asynchronous message services to callers.
ProcessAgent Created with IntelliJ IDEA.
Service Created with IntelliJ IDEA.
Session Created with IntelliJ IDEA.
ThreadedQueueDuplex Abstract definition for a class that contains two threaded queues running inbound and outbound.
ThreadedQueueManager A two way queue, running on it's own thread - the methods are duplicated inbound and outbound.
Worker Created with IntelliJ IDEA.
WorkerFactory Created with IntelliJ IDEA.
